SEG.ORIGINAL_TEXT: Muslim Glasgow dropout praised Tunisia attack

<a rel="nofollow" href="http://strathclyde.tab.co.uk/2015/07/01/jihadi-bride-and-glasgow-dropout-writes-sick-poem-praising-tunisia-attack/Aqsa" target="_blank">http://strathclyde.tab.co.uk/2015/07...ia-attack/Aqsa</a> Mahmood was doing Diagnostic Radiotherapy, now she’s in ISIS
Glasgow dropout and <b>ISIS bride Aqsa Mahmood has published a vile poem glorifying the terrorist attack in Tunisia which left 38 tourists dead.<b>

Jihadi bride Aqsa MahmoodIn a propaganda poem –– which shows a rookie handling of basic techniques like enjambement and rhyme –– Aqsa praises the Tunisia killing spree, which came at the same time as a beheading in France and the suicide bombing of a mosque in Kuwait.She writes it was: “A day that will go down in history. A day of resistance and memory.”
